Articles.Content:
For quite a while now in KSP mods I’ve been looking for a opportunity and some MER rovers mods but I can’t seem to find any.

however I ran into an old topic about Probes Plus adding some MER rovers,Now Listen...

I know that implementing rovers in the mod is not the main priority for mod devs but I would be thanked if someone could implement them,sincerely me :).

(also I found a MER/opportunity rover mod it’s called Prometheus solar rover developed by yogui87 however I don’t think he supports the LionHead AeroSpace mod anymore and isn’t gonna update it.)

Edited February 27, 2020 by Oppulse|12
Hello @Oppulse|12, your topic has been moved to add-on discussions.

On 2/26/2020 at 9:02 PM, Oppulse|12 said:

For quite a while now in KSP mods I’ve been looking for a opportunity and some MER rovers mods but I can’t seem to find any.

however I ran into an old topic about Probes Plus adding some MER rovers,Now Listen...

I know that implementing rovers in the mod is not the main priority for mod devs but I would be thanked if someone could implement them,sincerely me :).

(also I found a MER/opportunity rover mod it’s called Prometheus solar rover developed by yogui87 however I don’t think he supports the LionHead AeroSpace mod anymore and isn’t gonna update it.)

Sounds like a great project to learn to mod.  You should try it.
